thread.title: A great choice, we'll come back!
thread.title_full: A great choice, we'll come back! - Review of Hotel Odeon Saint-Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lxg133
title: A great choice, we'll come back!
text:
We were looking for a cosy hotel, offering high standard services and well located in the area of Odeon. We have not been disappointed! Location is great, in the hart of a very living area. Our room was on the street side but thanks to very good insulation (recently refurbished) was quite at all time. The room (junior suite) was very comfortable and the atmosphere (warm and quite) of the hotel suited us perfectly. Another experience that the hotel chains we are used to!
Room Tip: Try a "junior suite" at top floors, it is worth! See more room tips
